   19: %%
   20: 
   21: %% Test suite for erlang:decode_packet/3
   22: 
   23: -module(decode_packet_SUITE).
   24: 
   25: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   26: 
   27: -export([all/0, suite/0,groups/0,
   28:          init_per_testcase/2,end_per_testcase/2,
   29:          basic/1, ipv6/1, packet_size/1, neg/1, http/1, line/1, ssl/1, otp_8536/1,
   30:          otp_9389/1, otp_9389_line/1]).
   31: 
   32: suite() ->
   33:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   34:      {timetrap, {minutes, 1}}].
   35: 
   36: all() -> 
   37:     [basic, packet_size, neg, http, line, ssl, otp_8536,
   38:      otp_9389, otp_9389_line, ipv6].
   39: 
   40: groups() -> 
   41:     [].
   42: 
   43: init_per_testcase(Func, Config) when is_atom(Func), is_list(Config) ->
   44:     rand:seed(exsplus),
   45:     io:format("*** SEED: ~p ***\n", [rand:export_seed()]),
   46:     Config.
   47: 
   48: end_per_testcase(_Func, _Config) ->
   49:     ok.
   50: 
   51: basic(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   52:     Packet = <<101,22,203,54,175>>,
   53:     Rest = <<123,34,0,250>>,
   54:     Bin = <<Packet/binary,Rest/binary>>,
   55:     {ok, Bin, <<>>} = decode_pkt(raw,Bin),
   56: 
   57:     {more, 5+1} = decode_pkt(1,<<5,1,2,3,4>>),
   58:     {more, 5+2} = decode_pkt(2,<<0,5,1,2,3,4>>),
   59:     {more, 5+4} = decode_pkt(4,<<0,0,0,5,1,2,3,4>>),
   60: 
   61:     {more, undefined} = decode_pkt(1,<<>>),
   62:     {more, undefined} = decode_pkt(2,<<0>>),
   63:     {more, undefined} = decode_pkt(4,<<0,0,0>>),
   64: 
   65:     Types = [1,2,4,asn1,sunrm,cdr,fcgi,tpkt,ssl_tls],
   66: 
   67:     %% Run tests for different header types and bit offsets.
   68: 
   69:     lists:foreach(fun({Type,Bits})->basic_pack(Type,Packet,Rest,Bits), 
   70:                                     more_length(Type,Packet,Bits) end,
   71:                   [{T,B} || T<-Types, B<-lists:seq(0,32)]),
   72:     ok.
   73: 
   74: basic_pack(Type,Body,Rest,BitOffs) ->
   75:     {Bin,Unpacked,_} = pack(Type,Body,Rest,BitOffs),
   76:     {ok, Unpacked, Rest} = decode_pkt(Type,Bin),
   77:     case Rest of
   78:         <<>> -> ok;
   79:         _ -> 
   80:             <<_:1,NRest/bits>> = Rest,
   81:             basic_pack(Type,Body,NRest,BitOffs)
   82:     end.
   83: 
   84: more_length(Type,Body,BitOffs) ->
   85:     {Bin,_,_} = pack(Type,Body,<<>>,BitOffs),
   86:     HdrSize = byte_size(Bin) - byte_size(Body),
   87:     more_length_do(Type,HdrSize,Bin,byte_size(Bin)).
   88: 
   89: more_length_do(_,_,_,0) ->
   90:     ok;
   91: more_length_do(Type,HdrSize,Bin,Size) ->
   92:     TrySize = (Size*3) div 4,
   93:     NSize = if TrySize < HdrSize -> Size - 1;
   94:                true -> TrySize
   95:             end,
   96:     {B1,_} = split_binary(Bin,NSize),
   97:     {more, Length} = decode_pkt(Type,B1),
   98:     case Length of
   99:         L when L=:=byte_size(Bin) -> ok;
  100:         undefined when NSize<HdrSize -> ok
  101:     end,
  102:     more_length_do(Type,HdrSize,Bin,NSize).
  103: 
  104: 
  105: 
  106: pack(Type,Packet,Rest) ->
  107:     {Bin,Unpacked} = pack(Type,Packet),
  108:     {<<Bin/binary,Rest/bits>>,Unpacked}.
  109: 
  110: %pack(0,B,R,Bits) -> 
  111: %    pack(raw,B,R,Bits);
  112: %pack(raw,Body,Rest,BitOffs) ->
  113: %    Orig = <<0:BitOffs,Body/binary,Rest/bits>>,
  114: %    <<_:BitOffs,Bin/bits>> = Orig,
  115: %    {Bin,<<Bin/binary,Rest/bits>>,Orig};
  116: pack(Type,Body,Rest,BitOffs) ->
  117:     {Packet,Unpacked} = pack(Type,Body),
  118: 
  119:     %% Make Bin a sub-bin with an arbitrary bitoffset within Orig
  120:     Prefix = rand:uniform(1 bsl BitOffs) - 1,
  121:     Orig = <<Prefix:BitOffs,Packet/binary,Rest/bits>>,
  122:     <<_:BitOffs,Bin/bits>> = Orig,
  123:     {Bin,Unpacked,Orig}.
  124: 
  125: pack(1,Bin) ->
  126:     Psz = byte_size(Bin),
  127:     {<<Psz:8,Bin/binary>>, Bin};
  128: pack(2,Bin) ->
  129:     Psz = byte_size(Bin),
  130:     {<<Psz:16,Bin/binary>>, Bin};
  131: pack(4,Bin) ->
  132:     Psz = byte_size(Bin),
  133:     {<<Psz:32,Bin/binary>>, Bin};
  134: pack(asn1,Bin) ->
  135:     Ident = case rand:uniform(3) of
  136:                 1 -> <<17>>;
  137:                 2 -> <<16#1f,16#81,17>>;
  138:                 3 -> <<16#1f,16#81,16#80,16#80,17>>
  139:             end,
  140:     Psz = byte_size(Bin),
  141:     Length = case rand:uniform(4) of
  142:                  1 when Psz < 128 -> 
  143:                      <<Psz:8>>;
  144:                  R when R=<2 andalso Psz < 16#10000 ->
  145:                      <<16#82,Psz:16>>;
  146:                  R when R=<3 andalso Psz < 16#1000000 -> 
  147:                      <<16#83,Psz:24>>;
  148:                  _ when Psz < 16#100000000 ->
  149:                      <<16#84,Psz:32>>
  150:              end,
  151:     Res = <<Ident/binary,Length/binary,Bin/binary>>,
  152:     {Res,Res};
  153: pack(sunrm,Bin) ->
  154:     Psz = byte_size(Bin),
  155:     Res = if Psz < 16#80000000 ->
  156:                  <<Psz:32,Bin/binary>>
  157:           end,
  158:     {Res,Res};
  159: pack(cdr,Bin) ->
  160:     GIOP = <<"GIOP">>,
  161:     Major = rand:uniform(256) - 1,
  162:     Minor = rand:uniform(256) - 1,
  163:     MType = rand:uniform(256) - 1,
  164:     Psz = byte_size(Bin),
  165:     Res = case rand:uniform(2) of
  166:               1 -> <<GIOP/binary,Major:8,Minor:8,0:8,MType:8,Psz:32/big,Bin/binary>>;
  167:               2 -> <<GIOP/binary,Major:8,Minor:8,1:8,MType:8,Psz:32/little,Bin/binary>>
  168:           end,
  169:     {Res,Res};
  170: pack(fcgi,Bin) ->
  171:     Ver = 1,
  172:     Type = rand:uniform(256) - 1,
  173:     Id = rand:uniform(65536) - 1,
  174:     PaddSz = rand:uniform(16) - 1,
  175:     Psz = byte_size(Bin),
  176:     Reserv = rand:uniform(256) - 1,
  177:     Padd = rand:bytes(PaddSz),
  178:     Res = <<Ver:8,Type:8,Id:16,Psz:16/big,PaddSz:8,Reserv:8,Bin/binary>>,
  179:     {<<Res/binary,Padd/binary>>, Res};
  180: pack(tpkt,Bin) ->
  181:     Ver = 3,
  182:     Reserv = rand:uniform(256) - 1,
  183:     Size = byte_size(Bin) + 4,
  184:     Res = <<Ver:8,Reserv:8,Size:16,Bin/binary>>,
  185:     {Res, Res};
  186: pack(ssl_tls,Bin) ->
  187:     Content = case (rand:uniform(256) - 1) of
  188:                   C when C<128 -> C;
  189:                   _ -> v2hello
  190:               end,
  191:     Major = rand:uniform(256) - 1,
  192:     Minor = rand:uniform(256) - 1,
  193:     pack_ssl(Content,Major,Minor,Bin).
  194: 
  195: pack_ssl(Content, Major, Minor, Body) ->
  196:     case Content of
  197:         v2hello ->
  198:             Size = byte_size(Body),
  199:             Res = <<1:1,(Size+3):15, 1:8, Major:8, Minor:8, Body/binary>>,
  200:             C = 22,
  201:             Data = <<1:8, (Size+2):24, Major:8, Minor:8, Body/binary>>;
  202:         C when is_integer(C) ->
  203:             Size = byte_size(Body),
  204:             Res = <<Content:8, Major:8, Minor:8, Size:16, Body/binary>>,
  205:             Data = Body			    
  206:     end,
  207:     {Res, {ssl_tls,[],C,{Major,Minor}, Data}}.
  208: 
  209: ipv6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  210:     %% Test with port
  211:     Packet = <<"GET http://[FEDC:BA98:7654:3210:FEDC:BA98:7654:3210]:4000/echo_components HTTP/1.1\r\nhost: orange\r\n\r\n">>,
  212:     {ok, {http_request, 'GET',  {absoluteURI, http, <<"[FEDC:BA98:7654:3210:FEDC:BA98:7654:3210]">>, 4000, <<"/echo_components">>}, {1, 1}}, <<"host: orange\r\n\r\n">>} =
  213:       erlang:decode_packet(http_bin, Packet, []),
  214:     %% Test no port
  215:     Packet2 = <<"GET http://[FEDC:BA98:7654:3210:FEDC:BA98:7654:3210]/1234 HTTP/1.1\r\nhost: orange\r\n\r\n">>,
  216:     {ok, {http_request, 'GET',  {absoluteURI, http, <<"[FEDC:BA98:7654:3210:FEDC:BA98:7654:3210]">>, undefined, <<"/1234">>}, {1, 1}}, <<"host: orange\r\n\r\n">>} =
  217:       erlang:decode_packet(http_bin, Packet2, []),
  218:     %% Test short ipv6 form
  219:     Packet3 = <<"GET http://[::1]/1234 HTTP/1.1\r\nhost: orange\r\n\r\n">>,
  220:     {ok, {http_request, 'GET',  {absoluteURI, http, <<"[::1]">>, undefined, <<"/1234">>}, {1, 1}}, <<"host: orange\r\n\r\n">>} =
  221:       erlang:decode_packet(http_bin, Packet3, []),
  222:     %% Test missing `]`
  223:     Packet4 = <<"GET http://[FEDC:BA98:7654:3210:FEDC:BA98:7654:3210:4000/echo_components HTTP/1.1\r\nhost: orange\r\n\r\n">>,
  224:     {ok, {http_request, 'GET',  {absoluteURI, http, <<"[FEDC">>, undefined, <<"/echo_components">>}, {1, 1}}, <<"host: orange\r\n\r\n">>} =
  225:       erlang:decode_packet(http_bin, Packet4, []).
  226: 
  227: packet_size(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  228:     Packet = <<101,22,203,54,175>>,
  229:     Rest = <<123,34,0,250>>,
  230: 
  231:     F = fun({Type,Max})->
  232:                 {Bin,Unpacked} = pack(Type,Packet,Rest),
  233:                 case decode_pkt(Type,Bin,[{packet_size,Max}]) of
  234:                     {ok,Unpacked,Rest} when Max=:=0; Max>=byte_size(Packet) ->
  235:                         ok;
  236:                     {error,_} when Max<byte_size(Packet), Max=/=0 ->
  237:                         ok;
  238:                     {error,_} when Type=:=fcgi, Max=/=0 ->
  239:                         %% packet includes random amount of padding
  240:                         ok
  241:                 end
  242:         end,
  243:     lists:foreach(F, [{T,D} || T<-[1,2,4,asn1,sunrm,cdr,fcgi,tpkt,ssl_tls],
  244:                                D<-lists:seq(0, byte_size(Packet)*2)]),
  245: 
  246:     %% Test OTP-8102, "negative" 4-byte sizes.
  247:     lists:foreach(fun(Size) -> 
  248:                           {error,_} = decode_pkt(4,<<Size:32,Packet/binary>>)
  249:                   end, 
  250:                   lists:seq(-10,-1)),
  251: 
  252:     %% Test OTP-9389, long HTTP header lines.
  253:     Opts = [{packet_size, 128}],
  254:     Pkt = list_to_binary(["GET / HTTP/1.1\r\nHost: localhost\r\nLink: /",
  255:                           lists:duplicate(64, $Y), "\r\n\r\n"]),
  256:     <<Pkt1:50/binary, Pkt2/binary>> = Pkt,
  257:     {ok, {http_request,'GET',{abs_path,"/"},{1,1}}, Rest1} =
  258:     erlang:decode_packet(http, Pkt1, Opts),
  259:     {ok, {http_header,_,'Host',_,"localhost"}, Rest2} =
  260:     erlang:decode_packet(httph, Rest1, Opts),
  261:     {more, undefined} = erlang:decode_packet(httph, Rest2, Opts),
  262:     {ok, {http_header,_,"Link",_,_}, _} =
  263:     erlang:decode_packet(httph, list_to_binary([Rest2, Pkt2]), Opts),
  264: 
  265:     Pkt3 = list_to_binary(["GET / HTTP/1.1\r\nHost: localhost\r\nLink: /",
  266:                            lists:duplicate(129, $Y), "\r\n\r\n"]),
  267:     {ok, {http_request,'GET',{abs_path,"/"},{1,1}}, Rest3} =
  268:     erlang:decode_packet(http, Pkt3, Opts),
  269:     {ok, {http_header,_,'Host',_,"localhost"}, Rest4} =
  270:     erlang:decode_packet(httph, Rest3, Opts),
  271:     {error, invalid} = erlang:decode_packet(httph, Rest4, Opts),
  272: 
  273:     ok.
  274: 
  275: 
  276: neg(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  277:     Bin = <<"dummy">>,
  278:     Fun = fun()->dummy end,
  279: 
  280:     BadargF = fun(T,B,Opts)-> {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch decode_pkt(T,B,Opts)) end,
  281: 
  282:     %% Invalid Type args
  283:     lists:foreach(fun(T)-> BadargF(T,Bin,[]) end, 
  284:                   [3,-1,5,2.0,{2},unknown,[],"line",Bin,Fun,self()]),
  285: 
  286:     %% Invalid Bin args
  287:     lists:foreach(fun(B)-> BadargF(0,B,[]) end, 
  288:                   [3,2.0,unknown,[],"Bin",[Bin],{Bin},Fun,self()]),
  289: 
  290:     %% Invalid options
  291:     InvOpts = [2,false,self(),Bin,"Options",Fun,
  292:                packet_size,{packet_size},{packet_size,0,false},
  293:                {packet_size,-1},{packet_size,100.0},{packet_size,false},
  294:                {line_length,-1},{line_length,100.0},{line_length,false}],
  295: 
  296:     lists:foreach(fun(Opt)-> BadargF(0,Bin,Opt),
  297:                              BadargF(0,Bin,[Opt]),
  298:                              BadargF(0,Bin,[Opt,{packet_size,1000}]),
  299:                              BadargF(0,Bin,[{packet_size,1000},Opt]) end,
  300:                   InvOpts),
  301:     ok.
  302: 
  303: 
  304: http(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  305:     <<"foo">> = http_do(http_request("foo")),
  306:     <<" bar">> = http_do(http_request(" bar")),
  307:     <<"Hello!">> = http_do(http_response("Hello!")),
  308: 
  309:     %% Test all known header atoms
  310:     Val = "dummy value",
  311:     ValB = list_to_binary(Val),
  312:     Rest = <<"Rest">>,    
  313:     HdrF = fun(Str,N) ->  
  314:                    StrA = list_to_atom(Str),
  315:                    StrB = list_to_binary(Str),
  316:                    Bin = <<StrB/binary,": ",ValB/binary,"\r\n",Rest/binary>>,
  317:                    {ok, {http_header,N,StrA,Str,Val}, Rest} = decode_pkt(httph,Bin),
  318:                    {ok, {http_header,N,StrA,StrB,ValB}, Rest} = decode_pkt(httph_bin,Bin),
  319:                    N + 1
  320:            end,
  321:     lists:foldl(HdrF, 1, http_hdr_strings()),
  322: 
  323:     %% Test all known method atoms
  324:     MethF = fun(Meth) ->  
  325:                     MethA = list_to_atom(Meth),
  326:                     MethB = list_to_binary(Meth),
  327:                     Bin = <<MethB/binary," /invalid/url HTTP/1.0\r\n",Rest/binary>>,
  328:                     {ok, {http_request,MethA,{abs_path,"/invalid/url"},{1,0}},
  329:                      Rest} = decode_pkt(http,Bin),
  330:                     {ok, {http_request,MethA,{abs_path,<<"/invalid/url">>},{1,0}},
  331:                      Rest} = decode_pkt(http_bin,Bin)
  332:             end,
  333:     lists:foreach(MethF, http_meth_strings()),
  334: 
  335:     %% Test all uri variants    
  336:     UriF = fun({Str,ResL,ResB}) -> 
  337:                    Bin = <<"GET ",(list_to_binary(Str))/binary," HTTP/1.1\r\n",Rest/binary>>,
  338:                    {ok, {http_request, 'GET', ResL, {1,1}}, Rest} = decode_pkt(http,Bin),
  339:                    {ok, {http_request, 'GET', ResB, {1,1}}, Rest} = decode_pkt(http_bin,Bin) 
  340:            end,
  341:     lists:foreach(UriF, http_uri_variants()),
  342: 
  343:     %% Response with empty phrase
  344:     {ok,{http_response,{1,1},200,[]},<<>>} = decode_pkt(http, <<"HTTP/1.1 200\r\n">>, []),
  345:     {ok,{http_response,{1,1},200,<<>>},<<>>} = decode_pkt(http_bin, <<"HTTP/1.1 200\r\n">>, []),
  346: 
  347: 
  348:     %% Test error cases
  349:     {ok,{http_error,"Host\t: localhost:8000\r\n"},<<"a">>} =
  350:         decode_pkt(httph, <<"Host\t: localhost:8000\r\na">>, []),
  351:     {ok,{http_error,"Host : localhost:8000\r\n"},<<"a">>} =
  352:         decode_pkt(httph, <<"Host : localhost:8000\r\na">>, []),
  353:     {ok,{http_error," : localhost:8000\r\n"},<<"a">>} =
  354:         decode_pkt(httph, <<" : localhost:8000\r\na">>, []),
  355:     ok.
  356: 
  357: http_with_bin(http) ->
  358:     http_bin;
  359: http_with_bin(httph) ->
  360:     httph_bin.
  361: 
  362: http_do(Tup) ->
  363:     http_do(Tup,http).
  364: http_do({Bin, []}, _) ->
  365:     Bin;
  366: http_do({Bin,[{_Line,PL,PB}|Tail]}, Type) ->
  367:     {ok, PL, Rest} = decode_pkt(Type,Bin),
  368:     {ok, PB, Rest} = decode_pkt(http_with_bin(Type),Bin),
  369: 
  370:     %% Same tests again but as SubBin
  371:     PreLen = rand:uniform(64),
  372:     Prefix = rand:uniform(1 bsl PreLen) - 1,
  373:     SufLen = rand:uniform(64),
  374:     Suffix = rand:uniform(1 bsl SufLen) - 1,
  375:     Orig = <<Prefix:PreLen, Bin/bits, Suffix:SufLen>>,
  376:     BinLen = bit_size(Bin),
  377:     <<_:PreLen, SubBin:BinLen/bits, _/bits>> = Orig, % Make SubBin
  378:     SubBin = Bin, % just to make sure
  379: 
  380:     {ok, PL, Rest} = decode_pkt(Type,SubBin),
  381:     {ok, PB, Rest} = decode_pkt(http_with_bin(Type),SubBin),
  382:     http_do({Rest, Tail}, httph).
  383: 
  384: http_request(Msg) ->
  385:     QnA = [{"POST /invalid/url HTTP/1.1\r\n",
  386:             {http_request, 'POST', {abs_path,  "/invalid/url"  }, {1,1}},
  387:             {http_request, 'POST', {abs_path,<<"/invalid/url">>}, {1,1}}},
  388:            {"Connection: close\r\n",
  389:             {http_header,2,'Connection',  "Connection"  ,  "close"},
  390:             {http_header,2,'Connection',<<"Connection">>,<<"close">>}},
  391:            {"User-Agent: perl post\r\n",
  392:             {http_header,24,'User-Agent',  "User-Agent"  ,  "perl post"},
  393:             {http_header,24,'User-Agent',<<"User-Agent">>,<<"perl post">>}},
  394:            {"Content-Length: 4\r\n",
  395:             {http_header,38,'Content-Length',  "Content-Length"  ,  "4"},
  396:             {http_header,38,'Content-Length',<<"Content-Length">>,<<"4">>}},
  397:            {"Content-Type: text/xml; charset=utf-8\r\n",
  398:             {http_header,42,'Content-Type',  "Content-Type"  ,  "text/xml; charset=utf-8"},
  399:             {http_header,42,'Content-Type',<<"Content-Type">>,<<"text/xml; charset=utf-8">>}},
  400:            {"Other-Field: with some text\r\n",
  401:             {http_header,0,  "Other-Field"  ,  "Other-Field"  ,  "with some text"},
  402:             {http_header,0,<<"Other-Field">>,<<"Other-Field">>,<<"with some text">>}},
  403:            {"Content--Type: text/xml; charset=utf-8\r\n",
  404:             {http_header,0,  "Content--type"  ,  "Content--Type"  ,  "text/xml; charset=utf-8"},
  405:             {http_header,0,<<"Content--type">>,<<"Content--Type">>,<<"text/xml; charset=utf-8">>}},
  406:            {"Content---Type: text/xml; charset=utf-8\r\n",
  407:             {http_header,0,  "Content---Type"  ,  "Content---Type"  ,  "text/xml; charset=utf-8"},
  408:             {http_header,0,<<"Content---Type">>,<<"Content---Type">>,<<"text/xml; charset=utf-8">>}},
  409:            {"CONTENT-type: text/xml; charset=utf-8\r\n",
  410:             {http_header,42,'Content-Type',  "CONTENT-type"  ,  "text/xml; charset=utf-8"},
  411:             {http_header,42,'Content-Type',<<"CONTENT-type">>,<<"text/xml; charset=utf-8">>}},
  412:            {"OTHER-field: with some text\r\n",
  413:             {http_header,0,  "Other-Field"  ,  "OTHER-field"  ,  "with some text"},
  414:             {http_header,0,<<"Other-Field">>,<<"OTHER-field">>,<<"with some text">>}},
  415:            {"Make-sure-a-LONG-HEaDer-fIeLd-is-fORMATTED-NicelY: with some text\r\n",
  416:             {http_header,0,  "Make-Sure-A-Long-Header-Field-Is-Formatted-Nicely"  ,  "Make-sure-a-LONG-HEaDer-fIeLd-is-fORMATTED-NicelY"  ,  "with some text"},
  417:             {http_header,0,<<"Make-Sure-A-Long-Header-Field-Is-Formatted-Nicely">>,<<"Make-sure-a-LONG-HEaDer-fIeLd-is-fORMATTED-NicelY">>,<<"with some text">>}},
  418:            {"Multi-Line: Once upon a time in a land far far away,\r\n"
  419:             " there lived a princess imprisoned in the highest tower\r\n"
  420:             " of the most haunted castle.\r\n",
  421:             {http_header,0,  "Multi-Line"  ,  "Multi-Line"  ,  "Once upon a time in a land far far away,\r\n there lived a princess imprisoned in the highest tower\r\n of the most haunted castle."},
  422:             {http_header,0,<<"Multi-Line">>,<<"Multi-Line">>,<<"Once upon a time in a land far far away,\r\n there lived a princess imprisoned in the highest tower\r\n of the most haunted castle.">>}},
  423:            {"\r\n",
  424:             http_eoh,
  425:             http_eoh}],
  426:     Bin = lists:foldl(fun({Line,_,_},Acc) -> LineBin = list_to_binary(Line), 
  427:                                              <<Acc/binary,LineBin/binary>> end,
  428:                       <<"">>, QnA),
  429:     MsgBin = list_to_binary(Msg),
  430:     {<<Bin/binary,MsgBin/binary>>, QnA}.
  431: 
  432: 
  433: http_response(Msg) ->
  434:     QnA = [{"HTTP/1.0 404 Object Not Found\r\n",
  435:             {http_response, {1,0}, 404,   "Object Not Found"},
  436:             {http_response, {1,0}, 404, <<"Object Not Found">>}},
  437:            {"Server: inets/4.7.16\r\n",
  438:             {http_header, 30, 'Server',   "Server"  ,   "inets/4.7.16"},
  439:             {http_header, 30, 'Server', <<"Server">>, <<"inets/4.7.16">>}},
  440:            {"Date: Fri, 04 Jul 2008 17:16:22 GMT\r\n",
  441:             {http_header, 3, 'Date',   "Date"  ,   "Fri, 04 Jul 2008 17:16:22 GMT"},
  442:             {http_header, 3, 'Date', <<"Date">>, <<"Fri, 04 Jul 2008 17:16:22 GMT">>}},
  443:            {"Content-Type: text/html\r\n",
  444:             {http_header, 42, 'Content-Type',   "Content-Type"  ,   "text/html"},
  445:             {http_header, 42, 'Content-Type', <<"Content-Type">>, <<"text/html">>}},
  446:            {"Content-Length: 207\r\n",
  447:             {http_header, 38, 'Content-Length',   "Content-Length"  ,   "207"},
  448:             {http_header, 38, 'Content-Length', <<"Content-Length">>, <<"207">>}},
  449:            {"\r\n",
  450:             http_eoh,
  451:             http_eoh}],
  452: 
  453: 
  454: 
  455:     Bin = lists:foldl(fun({Line,_,_},Acc) -> LineBin = list_to_binary(Line), 
  456:                                              <<Acc/binary,LineBin/binary>> end,
  457:                       <<"">>, QnA),
  458:     MsgBin = list_to_binary(Msg),
  459:     {<<Bin/binary,MsgBin/binary>>, QnA}.
  460: 
  461: http_hdr_strings() ->
  462:     %% Must be correct order
  463:     ["Cache-Control","Connection","Date","Pragma","Transfer-Encoding",
  464:      "Upgrade","Via","Accept", "Accept-Charset", "Accept-Encoding",
  465:      "Accept-Language", "Authorization","From","Host","If-Modified-Since",
  466:      "If-Match","If-None-Match","If-Range","If-Unmodified-Since","Max-Forwards",
  467:      "Proxy-Authorization","Range","Referer","User-Agent","Age","Location",
  468:      "Proxy-Authenticate","Public","Retry-After","Server","Vary","Warning",
  469:      "Www-Authenticate","Allow","Content-Base","Content-Encoding",
  470:      "Content-Language","Content-Length","Content-Location","Content-Md5",
  471:      "Content-Range","Content-Type","Etag","Expires","Last-Modified",
  472:      "Accept-Ranges","Set-Cookie","Set-Cookie2","X-Forwarded-For","Cookie",
  473:      "Keep-Alive","Proxy-Connection"].
  474: 
  475: http_meth_strings() ->
  476:     ["OPTIONS", "GET", "HEAD", "POST", "PUT", "DELETE", "TRACE"].
  477: 
  478: http_uri_variants() ->
  479:     [{"*", '*', '*'},
  480:      {"http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986",
  481:       {absoluteURI,http,  "tools.ietf.org",  undefined,  "/html/rfc3986"},
  482:       {absoluteURI,http,<<"tools.ietf.org">>,undefined,<<"/html/rfc3986">>}},
  483:      {"http://otp.ericsson.se:8000/product/internal/",
  484:       {absoluteURI,http,  "otp.ericsson.se"  ,8000,  "/product/internal/"},
  485:       {absoluteURI,http,<<"otp.ericsson.se">>,8000,<<"/product/internal/">>}},
  486:      {"https://example.com:8042/over/there?name=ferret#nose",
  487:       {absoluteURI,https,  "example.com",  8042,  "/over/there?name=ferret#nose"},
  488:       {absoluteURI,https,<<"example.com">>,8042,<<"/over/there?name=ferret#nose">>}},
  489:      {"ftp://cnn.example.com&story=breaking_news@10.0.0.1/top_story.htm",
  490:       {scheme,  "ftp",    "//cnn.example.com&story=breaking_news@10.0.0.1/top_story.htm"},
  491:       {scheme,<<"ftp">>,<<"//cnn.example.com&story=breaking_news@10.0.0.1/top_story.htm">>}},
  492:      {"/some/absolute/path",
  493:       {abs_path,  "/some/absolute/path"},
  494:       {abs_path,<<"/some/absolute/path">>}},
  495:      {"something_else", "something_else", <<"something_else">>}].
  496: 
  497: 
  498: line(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  499:     Text = <<"POST /invalid/url HTTP/1.1\r\n"
  500:              "Connection: close\r\n"
  501:              "Host\t : localhost:8000\r\n"
  502:              "User-Agent: perl post\r\n"
  503:              "Content-Length: 4\r\n"
  504:              "Content-Type: text/xml; charset=utf-8\r\n"
  505:              "Other-Field: with some text\r\n"
  506:              "Multi-Line: Once upon a time in a land far far away,\r\n"
  507:              " there lived a princess imprisoned in the highest tower\r\n"
  508:              " of the most haunted castle.\r\n"
  509:              "\r\nThe residue">>,
  510: 
  511:     lists:foreach(fun(MaxLen) -> line_do(Text,MaxLen) end,
  512:                   [0,7,19,29,37]),
  513:     ok.
  514: 
  515: line_do(Bin,MaxLen) ->
  516:     Res = decode_pkt(line,Bin,[{line_length,MaxLen}]),
  517:     MyRes = decode_line(Bin,MaxLen),
  518:     MyRes = Res,
  519:     case Res of
  520:         {ok,_,Rest} ->
  521:             line_do(Rest,MaxLen);
  522:         {more,undefined} ->
  523:             ok
  524:     end.
  525: 
  526: % Emulates decode_packet(line,Bin,[{line_length,MaxLen}])
  527: decode_line(Bin,MaxLen) ->
  528:     case find_in_binary($\n,Bin) of
  529:         notfound when MaxLen>0 andalso byte_size(Bin) >= MaxLen ->
  530:             {LineB,Rest} = split_binary(Bin,MaxLen),
  531:             {ok,LineB,Rest};
  532:         notfound ->
  533:             {more,undefined};
  534:         Pos when MaxLen>0 andalso Pos > MaxLen ->
  535:             {LineB,Rest} = split_binary(Bin,MaxLen),
  536:             {ok,LineB,Rest};
  537:         Pos ->
  538:             {LineB,Rest} = split_binary(Bin,Pos),
  539:             {ok,LineB,Rest}
  540:     end.
  541: 
  542: find_in_binary(Byte, Bin) ->
  543:     case string:find(Bin, [Byte]) of
  544:         nomatch -> notfound;
  545:         Suffix -> byte_size(Bin) - byte_size(Suffix) + 1
  546:     end.    
  547: 
  548: ssl(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  549:     Major = 34,
  550:     Minor = 17,
  551:     Body = <<234,189,73,199,1,32,4,0,254>>,
  552:     Rest = <<23,123,203,12,234>>,
  553: 
  554:     F = fun(Content) ->
  555:                 {Packet,Unpacked} = pack_ssl(Content, Major, Minor, Body),
  556:                 Bin = <<Packet/binary,Rest/binary>>,
  557:                 {ok, Unpacked, Rest} = decode_pkt(ssl_tls, Bin)
  558:         end,    
  559:     F(25),
  560:     F(v2hello),
  561:     ok.
  562: 
  563: %% Corrupt sub-binary-strings from httph_bin
  564: otp_8536(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  565:     lists:foreach(fun otp_8536_do/1, lists:seq(1,50)),
  566:     ok.
  567: 
  568: otp_8536_do(N) ->
  569:     Data = <<"some data 123">>,
  570:     Letters = <<"bcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyzyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba">>,
  571:     <<HdrTail:N/binary,_/binary>> = Letters,
  572:     Hdr = <<$A, HdrTail/binary>>,
  573:     Bin = <<Hdr/binary, ": ", Data/binary, "\r\n\r\n">>,
  574: 
  575:     io:format("Bin='~p'\n",[Bin]),
  576:     {ok,{http_header,0,Hdr2,Hdr2,Data2},<<"\r\n">>} = decode_pkt(httph_bin, Bin,  []),
  577: 
  578:     %% Do something to trash the C-stack, how about another decode_packet:
  579:     decode_pkt(httph_bin,<<Letters/binary, ": ", Data/binary, "\r\n\r\n">>, []),
  580: 
  581:     %% Now check that we got the expected binaries
  582:     {Hdr, Data} = {Hdr2, Data2}.
  583: 
  584: decode_pkt(Type,Bin) ->
  585:     decode_pkt(Type,Bin,[]).		       
  586: decode_pkt(Type,Bin,Opts) ->
  587:     %%io:format("decode_packet(~p,~p,~p)\n",[Type,Bin,Opts]),
  588:     Res = erlang:decode_packet(Type,Bin,Opts),
  589:     %%io:format(" -> ~p\n",[Res]),
  590:     Res.
  591: 
  592: %% Verify line_length works correctly for HTTP headers
  593: otp_9389(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  594:     Opts = [{packet_size, 16384}, {line_length, 3000}],
  595:     Pkt = list_to_binary(["GET / HTTP/1.1\r\nHost: localhost\r\nLink: /",
  596:                           lists:duplicate(8192, $X),
  597:                           "\r\nContent-Length: 0\r\n\r\n"]),
  598:     <<Pkt1:5000/binary, Pkt2/binary>> = Pkt,
  599:     {ok, {http_request,'GET',{abs_path,"/"},{1,1}}, Rest1} =
  600:     erlang:decode_packet(http, Pkt1, Opts),
  601:     {ok, {http_header,_,'Host',_,"localhost"}, Rest2} =
  602:     erlang:decode_packet(httph, Rest1, Opts),
  603:     {more, undefined} = erlang:decode_packet(httph, Rest2, Opts),
  604:     {ok, {http_header,_,"Link",_,Link}, Rest3} =
  605:     erlang:decode_packet(httph, list_to_binary([Rest2, Pkt2]), Opts),
  606:     true = (length(Link) > 8000),
  607:     {ok, {http_header,_,'Content-Length',_,"0"}, <<"\r\n">>} =
  608:     erlang:decode_packet(httph, Rest3, Opts),
  609:     ok.
  610: 
  611: %% Verify packet_size works correctly for line mode
  612: otp_9389_line(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  613:     Opts = [{packet_size, 20}],
  614:     Line1 = <<"0123456789012345678\n">>,
  615:     Line2 = <<"0123456789\n">>,
  616:     Line3 = <<"01234567890123456789\n">>,
  617:     Pkt = list_to_binary([Line1, Line2, Line3]),
  618:     {ok, Line1, Rest1} = erlang:decode_packet(line, Pkt, Opts),
  619:     {ok, Line2, Rest2} = erlang:decode_packet(line, Rest1, Opts),
  620:     {error, invalid} = erlang:decode_packet(line, Rest2, Opts),
  621:     ok.
